ygData.msgSnippet: I am an 18th level mage and i am interested in what your findings where.  like the language used, componants and such to check to see if my findings are the
ygData.messageBody:
I am an 18th level mage and i am interested in what your findings
where. like the language used, componants and
such to check to see if my findings are the same. i haven't been
successful but am still trying. i am also on
the E'ci server. I play a dark elf magician named Baltezar.

mail wrote:

> From: "mail" <crutchfield@...>
>
> I recently researched my first spell successfully. I was so proud i just
> wanted to share it with you all. It was a minor summons, but its a start.
>
> Laralorn 19th Mage of E'ci
